Set pose_topic for FollowObject goal message (#91)

Set goal_msg.pose_topic to '/detected_dynamic_pose' so it is sent to server properly.

data.author: Michael Ferguson
data.message:
refactor on upstream graceful controller (#11)

 * use upstream SmoothControlLaw
 * parameterize the control law parameters
 * cleanup parameters and make dynamic
 * Undock: allow cancel/preempt to work even if disableCharging is blocking
 * Test: update the test to publish that we aren't charging during undock
 * Test: actually check the return codes to make sure we get what we want

data.author: Michael Ferguson
data.message:
refactor of docking server (#8)

* refactor into separate functions
* explicitly transform dock_pose to fixed_frame_
* handle preempts
* const correctness
* add stashDockData
* complete retry handling
